LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.label: Incubation Speed
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.description: The incubation speed multiplier applied to the Hatchery.
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.label: Biomass Transmission Loss
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.descripti: Reduces fuel consumption when transmitting biomass. The final consumption will be multiplied by (1 - efficiency).
LanguageData.ARA_Incubation_StatCategory.label: Incubation Stats
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.label: Incubation Nutrient Cost
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.description: The amount of nutrients required to hatch this armed organ/fabric.
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.label: Incubation Time Required
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.description: The time required to hatch this armed organ/fabric.
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.label: Instant Freeze Damage Threshold
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.description: The maximum damage the Arachnae insectoid takes under instant freeze. Instant freeze damage will be multiplied by (1 - threshold).
